headline: Ardian Rocked my world for a good 5 years. Encore Une Fois ;)
pros: I grew up here.  I felt part of a big family, and had the best years. The family feel of the office, the premises , the treatment of employees , benefits, bonus and the general day to day was always somewhere I looked forward to walking into. I saw the company grow from 10 people to over 150 , and 1 floor to 5 floors in London.  Lots of lovely, hard working people here. I had a blast!  Dominique Senequier is an absolute inspiration of a woman and has helped the lives of hundreds of very fortunate employees. She helped mine and I am eternally grateful. There are many people I would like to mention but best not but you know who you are :)
cons: I cannot really fault this place , even if there were politics, I found it always very entertaining, and would be nice I guess if sometimes smaller voices were given more of a chance and true entrepreneurial spirit were picked up and built on.
